name: Hand Fever
description:
Washing your hands has never been this important... or this fun! Feel the melodies as you eliminate the bacteria that plague your hands!

Project realized by Hard Mode, a group of students from ESNE for the Game JamOn 2020.

music credits: 13once, dankmus, Unknown Brain, Scott Bucley, Spectrum, Verse One, Olexandr Ignatov.
